short_summary: Radio Frequency Power Amplifier Module(s) for Health Canada
description: RF Power Amplifier Module(s) for Health Canada. The contract will cover the minimum frequency range of 20 to 48 GHz. Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be received on or before 29 March 2023. Contract period: one year after delivery and acceptance. Mandatory requirements must be met.

full_summary:
================

**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
------------------------------------------

### Request for Proposal: RF Power Amplifier Module

**Reference Number:** WS3609362853-Doc3647344168

**Solicitation Number:** WS3609362853

**Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2022, 14:00 EDT

**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 30, 2022

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

### Overview

Health Canada is seeking bids for the procurement of Radio Frequency (RF) power amplifier modules operating in the frequency range of 20 to 48 GHz. Deliveries must be received in Ottawa, ON, by March 29, 2023.

### Requirements

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP). The period of the Contract will be from the date of Contract award to one year after delivery and acceptance, inclusive.

### Technical Specifications

* The RF power amplifier module(s) must operate in the frequency range of 20 to 48 GHz.
* Delivery must be received in Ottawa, ON, by March 29, 2023.

### Selection Criteria

* The award will be based on the lowest price submitted.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali
Email: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* The deadline for bid submission has been modified to October 13, 2022, 14:00 EDT.
* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the new deadline to be considered responsive.
* Health Canada will not consider bids submitted after 14:00 EDT on October 13, 2022.

### Viewing the Tender

To view the tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery portal:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13999566?extsite=MTM5OTk1NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13999566?extsite=MTM5OTk1NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)Note
